sentences.sContent: Ben Brantley's article on Sir Ian McKellen rekindled many memories.
sentences.sCn: 本•布兰特利关于伊恩•麦凯伦爵士的文章唤回许多记忆。

remMethod.val: re(重新) + kindle(点燃) → 重新点燃

trans.tranOther: If something rekindles an interest, feeling, or thought that you used to have, it makes you think about it or feel it again
